body: Moonlight is one the really few porn makers who has men do something with all these huge female features, male who put a real effort into love making and relationships.

YES! The other episodes are translated (seemingly from another publication). Come on! This is the first episode. There are so many worthless doujinshi out there with duplicate, triplicate or even more translations. This one does deserve to be translated into English. Artist Moonlight rocks.
I know it's against the rules to ask for translations, but any particular reason this one, the first one in the series, is untranslated, and the only one untranslated?
I would like to ask Facedesk translated this doujinshi for me
